unnormalised: Spotted! Ranbir Kapoor, sans Alia, hitting up Elco Market, Bandra at around 21:00 hrs on 26/07/2024. Witnesses say he devoured at least 6 plates of pani puri. Six! Is the Brahmastra diet off the rails?
normalised: Spotted! Ranbir Kapoor, sans Alia, hitting up Elco Market, Bandra at around twenty one hundred hours on twenty sixth July two thousand and twenty four. Witnesses say he devoured at least six plates of pani puri. Six! Is the Brahmastra diet off the rails?

unnormalised: Meanwhile, whispers are flying around Bollywood faster than a Mumbai local train. Rumor has it that Sara Ali Khan and Shubman Gill were seen leaving Olive Bar & Kitchen at 02:30 AM on 27/07/2024. Are they just good friends, or is there something *more* brewing than just a late-night snack? Remember the dating rumours from last year?

unnormalised: And speaking of relationships, are Katrina Kaif and Vicky Kaushal planning a second honeymoon? Our sources tell us they were browsing Maldives packages online at 14:00 hrs on 25/07/2024. Guess someone needs a break after all the Tiger 3 promotions! Time for some Vitamin D and maybe a little Bollywood gossip of their own. We’ll keep you posted, folks!
